feed.title: The Rebellion Resources
feed.subtitle: Resources portal for the Web Design Rebellion course.

entry.title: Welcome to the Resources Portal
entry.content:
Welcome, Rebel.

This is your new home for course materials, prompts, and updates. We have just launched this portal to help you track your progress and access the tools you need.

Check the Curriculum tab for your first lessons. Explore the Prompt Library to supercharge your workflow.

Stay tuned for more modules coming next week.
